Literature.Title: Teaching 'old' polymyxins new tricks: new-generation lipopeptides targeting gram-negative 'superbugs'.
Literature.Author: Velkov T, Roberts KD, Nation RL, Wang J, Thompson PE, Li J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=4-32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 70022(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700698(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700699(MIC=4µg/ml)
